title: Witchita
description: A young girl comes of age and discovers her family has many dark secrets.
quote: I understand my obligation... to kill.
creator: Susan Cheryl
altHero: a blonde woman with a young girl in the woods with lit candles
alt1: two women and a young girl standing around a body on the ground entangled in tree branches
alt3: in the woods at night, two people approach a pentagram made of fire surrounded by lit candles
alt4: two cloaked women against a backlit night
